Munich Tourism: Information for travellers • muenchen.de Search Close search Anzeige Branchenbuch Suchbegriff(e) eingeben Search Menu Anzeige Branchenbuch Navigation Language City Hall Events Culture, Leisure Restaurants Shopping Sights Tourism Hotels Business Living Transportation Aktuelle Sprache: English Deutsch Français Italiano Español Русский العربية 中文 Home Tourism Home Ad Branchenbuch Tourism in Munich: What the city has to offer This is a carousel with rotating cards. Use the previous and next buttons to
              navigate, and Enter to activate cards. Previous Slide 1 / 3 A walk through Westend Out and about with designer Christian Hundertmark Out and about with designer Christian Hundertmark 2 / 3 Isarphilharmonie, Neues Volkstheater & more 4 new cultural stages for Munich 4 new cultural stages for Munich 3 / 3 How to shop like royalty A visit to the former purveyors to the court A visit to the former purveyors to the court Next Slide Visit Munich: The ideal holiday destination From lakes, parks and beer gardens to museums, historical sites and massive stores, there's something for everyone who visits Munich. If you seek the finest beers, the most idyllic views, eco-parks, amazing cuisine, mind-blowing art collections or you just wish to sit in the midst of really great people, a trip to the Bavarian capital is all you need. Sit back and relax while we take you on a rollercoaster of places to visit and things to do in Munich! Sightseeing in Munich Our overview of Munich's most important places Hotels in Munich Looking for where to stay in Munich?
